heading: Brokerages
subHeading: Connect to the live markets using any of our supported brokerages
content: Brokerages supply a connection to the exchanges so that you can automate orders using LEAN. You can use multiple data feeds in live trading algorithms.

featureShortDescription.01: US Equities, Forex, CFD, Crypto, Futures, & Future Options
featureShortDescription.06: US Equities, Equity Options, Forex, Futures, Future Options, Index, & Index Options
featureShortDescription.11: India Equities, India Equity Options, & India Futures
